00021 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter.h"
00022 //
00023 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CHPQuantificationDetectionData.h"
00024 //
00025 
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00027 
00028 CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter(CHPQuantificationDetectionData &p)
00029 {
00030     maxProbeSetName = p.GetMaxProbeSetName();
00031         writer = new GenericFileWriter(p.GetFileHeader());
00032         WriteHeaders();
00033 }
00034 
00035 CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::~CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter()
00036 {
00037         delete writer;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::WriteHeaders()
00041 {
00042         writer->WriteHeader();
00043         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00044         dataGroupWriter.WriteHeader();
00045 
00046         //int iSet=0;
00047         DataSetWriterIt beginSet;
00048         DataSetWriterIt endSet;
00049         dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriters(beginSet, endSet);
00050         if (beginSet != endSet)
00051         {
00052                 dataSetWriter = &(*beginSet);
00053                 beginSet->WriteHeader();
00054                 entryPos = SetFilePositions();
00055                 dataGroupWriter.UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00056         }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::SeekToDataSet()
00060 {
00061         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00062         dataSetWriter = &dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriter(0);
00063         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(entryPos);
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::WriteEntry(const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData& p)
00067 {
00068     if (maxProbeSetName == -1)
00069         dataSetWriter->Write(p.id);
00070     else
00071         dataSetWriter->Write(p.name, maxProbeSetName);
00072         dataSetWriter->Write(p.quantification);
00073     dataSetWriter->Write(p.pvalue);
00074 }
00075 
00076 int32_t CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter::SetFilePositions()
00077 {
00078         int32_t dataSetSz = dataSetWriter->GetDataSetSize();
00079         int32_t offset = writer->GetFilePos();
00080         writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(dataSetSz + 1);
00081         dataSetWriter->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00082         return offset;
00083 }
